DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year Informed write consent At least one follow 1 . Patient use oral anticoagulation ( warfarin , dabigatran rivaroxaban ) 2 . Anemia ( hemoglobin threshold : < 117g/l woman < 134 g/l men ) thrombocytopenia ( < 100 ) detect < 6 month prior PCI 3 . Active malign disease ( metastatic cancer ongoing radio chemotherapy ) 4 . Prior intracerebral hemorrhage ischemic stroke 5 . Severe kidney liver dysfunction ( eGFR < 30ml/kg/min , liver cirrhosis , BIL > 2x threshold ALAT > 3x threshold ) 6 . Elective surgery plan < 12 month PCI 7 . General frailty e.g . long corticosteroid treatment generalize cachexia ( BMI < 20 kg/m2 ) 8 . Age ≥ 80 year 9 . Inability suspect inability use DAPT 12 month Either follow : 1 . Stable angina dyspnea coronary narrow cause myocardial ischemia detect angiogram .
